metadata.title: CVE-2010-2474 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: JBoss Enterprise Service Bus (ESB) before 4.7 CP02 in JBoss Enterprise SOAPlatform before 5.0.2 does not properly consider the security domain withwhich a service is secured, which might allow remote attackers to gainprivileges by executing a service.

criterions.comment: jbossas4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
